title: Bicycle
brief_description: This stylish and fast moving BBC series celebrates the spirit of freedom and presents the definitive story of humankind’s noblest invention. Six episodes of twenty minutes are presented on this tape: “Invention”: history and evolution of the modern bike from Leonardo to the safety bike of 1885, includes re-enactments and life-size working reproductions. “Wheels of change”: modern cycle design including the history of the mountain bike and the recumbent. “The Ultimate”: follow a season with champion rider Greg LeMond. Includes all the passion and hype of the Tour De France. “The Business”: Insight into bicycle manufacturers like Schwinn, Shimano, Raleigh and Peugot as well as the stars of the Japanese Keirin racing business. “Free Spirits”: The joys and sweetspots of cycling, why cyclists love it! “Vehicle for a small planet”: The compelling global argument for the mass return to the bicycle as the perfect green vehicle for a small planet.
